title: U.S. household expenditure on soaps and detergents 2007 to 2018
yAxis: Average annual expenditure in U.S. dollars
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Average annual expenditure in U.S. dollars. In total the number of data points it has is 12.
Overall Average annual expenditure in U.S. dollars has increased over the Year.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2016 and 2017.
Maximum Average annual expenditure in U.S. dollars, about 92.05 was reported at Year 2018
Minimum Average annual expenditure in U.S. dollars about 75.68 was reached at Year 2007
